entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people looking at Harry, along with Ron and Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people looking at Harry, along with Hermione and Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as one of the people looking at Harry, along with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in this scene, and is being spoken to by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as someone who should have won the gold instead of Harry.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley spoke to Harry, trying to comfort him and encourage him to take his potion.
Harry feels that Cedric should have won the gold instead of him, as he says "It should've been Cedric's".
Harry has already won the gold, which is mentioned in the text as something that Mrs. Weasley wants him to keep and think about.
